# Dependencies
node_modules/

# Environment files
.env
.env.local
.env.*.local

# Logs
logs/
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Directory for instrumented libs generated by jscoverage/JSCover
lib-cov

# Coverage directory
coverage/
*.lcov
.nyc_output

# Test files
*.test.js
*.spec.js

# Build files
dist/
build/

# IDE
.idea/
.vscode/
*.swp
*.swo

# OS
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/
